thread.title: Thomas Straeter
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Thomas Straeter

author: Thomas Straeter
title: Thomas Straeter
text: The website has a large selection of glasses which is what the company gets one point for. The entire handling proces is a disaster which I can only summarise as the worst shopping experience ever. I will not go back. I will inform my friends and familiy not to order with this company.
